Client¶

class Client.Client[source]¶

This class provides the Python interface for communicating with the Nearist appliances.

Commands are communicated via TCP/IP to the appliance server.

close()[source]¶

Close the socket to the Nearist appliance.

ds_load(vectors)[source]¶

Load dataset to Nearist appliance

Parameters:vectors – List of vectors (component lists)
get_timer_value()[source]¶

Get board time measurement in nanoseconds.

load_dataset_file(file_name, dataset_name)[source]¶

Load local dataset to Nearist appliance

Parameters:
  • file_name (string) – Local dataset file name
  • dataset_name (string) – Local dataset name
open(host, port, api_key)[source]¶

Open a socket for communication with the Nearist appliance.

Parameters:
  • host (string) – IP address of the Nearist appliance.
  • port (integer) – Port number for accessing the Nearist appliance.
  • api_key (string) – Unique user access key which is required to access the appliance.
query(vectors)[source]¶

Query for single/multiple vector(s)

Parameters:vectors (list or list of lists) – List of components for single query / List of vectors (component lists) for multipel query
reset()[source]¶

Reset the Nearist hardware, clearing all stored data.

reset_timer()[source]¶

Reset board time measurement timer.

set_distance_mode(mode)[source]¶

Set the distance metric.

Parameters:mode (Common.DistanceMode) – Distance metric from Common.DistanceMode
set_query_mode(mode)[source]¶

Set query mode

Parameters:mode (Common.QueryMode) – Query mode from Common.QueryMode
set_read_count(count)[source]¶

Set query result count for KNN_D/KNN_A query mode(s)

Parameters:count (integer) – The top ‘K’ values in KNN
set_threshold(threshold_lower, threshold_upper=None)[source]¶

Set query threshold for GT/LT/RANGE query mode(s)

Parameters:
  • threshold_lower (integer) – Lower threshold value.
  • threshold_upper (integer) – Upper threshold value, defaults to None.
